## Subtitle

```{r}
#| label: fig-boxplot
#| fig-cap: "City and highway mileage for 38 popular models of cars."

mtcars %>% 
  ggplot(aes(cyl, mpg, group = cyl)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  theme(
        # X axis
        axis.title.x = element_blank(),
        axis.text.x = element_text(color = "#F2F2F2"),
        axis.ticks.x = element_line(size = .5, color = "white"),
        axis.ticks.length.x = unit(0.25, "cm"),
        # Y axis
        axis.title.y = element_blank(),
        axis.text.y = element_text(color = "#F2F2F2"),
        axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
        # Grid
        panel.grid = element_line(color = "#F2F2F2", size = .15),
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
        panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(),
        # Legend
        legend.title = element_blank(),
        legend.text = element_text(color = "gray"),
        legend.position = c(0.275, 1.1),
        legend.background = element_rect(fill = NA),
        legend.margin = margin(0, 0, 0, 0, "cm"),
        legend.key = element_rect(fill = NA),
        legend.key.size = unit(.65, "cm"),
        legend.direction = "horizontal",
        # Backgrounds
        plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#2E2E2E", color = NA),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#2E2E2E"))
```
